author: Simon Jones For Mailonline
title: Southampton close in on free agent Martin Caceres | Daily Mail Online
text: Share He held further discussions with AC Milan but that fell through also. Southampton need cover after losing Virgil Van Dijk to injury and selling Jose Fonte to West Ham. Star defender Van Dijk will miss the EFL Cup final against Manchester United. The Dutch centre half suffered an ankle injury against Leicester on January 22 and manager Claude Puel revealed on Thursday he faces up to three months on the sidelines. That means he is certain to be out of the Wembley cup clash against Jose Mourinho's United on February 26. Southampton ace Virgil Van Dijk is expected to be out for up to three months through injury Jose Fonte (right, pictured facing his former side) left Southampton in the January window Share or comment on this article Most watched Sport videos
